argument.description: An expression that represents the string value to be hashed.
An expression that represents the string value to be hashed.

description: The HASH8 function returns the 64-bit hash of an input string. The function provides 264 distinct return values and is intended for data retrieval (that is, lookups). The result for a particular input string differs depending on the endianness (big-endian or little-endian) of your system.
